Name: In Marte - The First Moon
About the game: In the game on Mars, Dom wakes up in a ship without knowing very well where he is, nor why he is there, much less where his body ended up. Help Dom find answers and have fun in this mind-blowing adventure. Explore: Explore the scenario looking for answers and interact with different objects. Enemy: Destroy the enemies that will appear in the course of the adventure. Upgrade: Collect experiences throughout the journey and increase the character's level. Puzzle: Go through the various puzzles that Dom will find on your way and explore the scenery a lot to find the hidden objects. NPc'S: Help the characters in the story and gain much more experience
